title.rendered: University of Canberra International Alumni Scholarship 2024

content.rendered:
University of Canberra International Alumni Scholarship, Eligibility criteria, List of Courses, and How to Apply for the Scholarship.

Contents on This Page

Toggle
    • Eligibility criteria
    • How to Apply for the University of Canberra International Alumni Scholarship
  • List of Courses Offered in University of Canberra, Australia

This is to inform all students that the  Canberra International Alumni Scholarship ongoing for all interested candidates

University of Canberra International Alumni Scholarship is awarded to new commencing students who have completed their Bachelor’s degree at the University of Canberra and applying for admission to a UC Master Degree coursework.

Table of contents

University of Canberra International Alumni Scholarship

Eligibility for University of Canberra International Alumni Scholarship

How to Apply

List of Courses Offered in University of Canberra, Australia

A summary of the Scholarship is given below;

  • Degree:                        Masters
  • Awarded by:               University of Canberra
  • Deadline:                    Open for Application (Varying deadlines)
  • Scholarship value:      Partial Funding, 10% off total Tuition fees
  • Eligibility:                   All Citizen

Eligibility criteria

  • Master by coursework
  • Any citizenship
  • Commencing
  • Master degree
  • Full-time student
  • Offshore
  • Onshore
  • Bruce students only
  • Articulation and Sponsored students not eligible
  • Diplomatic students not eligible

Available courses for the Scholarship

  • Bachelor of Arts (Digital Media)
  • Bachelor of Biomedical Science
  • Bachelor of Building and Construction Management
  • Bachelor of Business (International Business)
  • Bachelor of Communication and Media (Corporate and Public Communication)
  • Bachelor of Design (Interaction Design)
  • Bachelor of Engineering in Network and Software Engineering (Honours)
  • Bachelor of Environmental Science
  • Bachelor of Health Science (Human Movement)
  • Bachelor of Health Science (Nutrition Studies)
  • Bachelor of Medical Science
  • Bachelor of Science
  • Bachelor of Sports and Exercise Science
  • Master of Data Science
  • Master of Human Resources Management
  • Master of International Business
  • Master of Law
  • Master of Marketing Management

Note:

  • Articulation and Sponsored students not eligible
  • Diplomatic students not eligible

Value: Successful applicants will receive 10% off the total tuition fees.

How to Apply for the University of Canberra International Alumni Scholarship

  • Go to the University Of Canberra Application Portal
  • Select Student Type (Domestic, International, Research)
  • Click Apply through University Online Application Portal
  • Click on Register (New User) or Login (Returning User)
  • Provide accurate information
  • Upload documents where necessary
  • Submit

List of Courses Offered in University of Canberra, Australia

Bachelor and Master by coursework

  • Bachelor of Engineering in Network and Software Engineering (Honours)

Bachelor by coursework

  • Master of Law
  • Bachelor of Building and Construction Management
  • Bachelor of Design (Interaction Design)
  • Bachelor of Science
  • Bachelor of Arts (Digital Media)
  • Master of Human Resources Management
  • Bachelor of Sports and Exercise Science
  • Bachelor of Health Science (Human Movement)
  • Master of Marketing Management
  • Bachelor of Biomedical Science
  • Bachelor of Business (International Business)
  • Bachelor of Communication and Media (Corporate and Public Communication)

For More required information, please subscribe to our newsletter and receive current updates about scholarships across the Nation.
